 in Mesopotamia 3000 BC]]

'Mosaic' is the art of creating images with an assemblage of small pieces of
colored glass, stone, or other materials. It may be a technique of decorative
art, an aspect of interior decoration, or of cultural and spiritual significance
as in a cathedral. Small pieces, mostly roughly square, of stone or glass of
different colors, known as [[tesserae]], (diminutive tessellae), are used to
create a pattern or picture.
